channel.title: Two Ring Soft % UX
channel.description: Two Ring Software's RSS Feed for updates on UX.

item.title: Tag Everything
item.description: A small request for sharing some simple organizational features amongst more of Apple's productivity apps, with some mockups of what it might look like in Reminders and Calendar.

item.title: Reach Out and Touch Faith
item.description: Thinking about the future of the Macbook Pro, and the direction in which the TouchBar might indicate it's headed.

item.title: Apple's Tech Evolutions
item.description: Extrapolating Apple's technological advances from the past onto their current product lines and research, for funsies.

item.title: Xcode 9's New Find and Replace Panel
item.description: A critique of the new source editors tool's UI and UX.

item.title: Passwords
item.description: Anecdata regarding antipatterns in the realm of password management for your service's users.
